articles.description: Lakers center Dwight Howard has had to endure the death of Kobe Bryant and the NBA shutdown. Then the mother of his 6-year-old son died.
articles.content:
Dwight Howard has spent the last two months at his 23-acre home in Georgia, with his children and pets keeping him company throughout the COVID-19 pandemic. 
One day in late March, the Lakers center was thinking about inviting Melissa Rios, the mother of his… [+3029 chars]

articles.title: NFL teams can reopen facilities next week if protocols met, local regulations allow - ESPN
articles.description: NFL teams could begin using their facilities again starting Tuesday, provided they meet a preestablished set of protocols and have permission under state and local regulations.
articles.content:
NFL teams can begin reopening their facilities next week, although coaches and non-rehabbing players still will not be permitted, according to a memo obtained by ESPN on Friday.
In the memo sent to the 32 NFL teams, commissioner Roger Goodell wrote that club… [+2167 chars]
